title.rendered: Huobi Review, How To Create Huobi Account

content.rendered:
Huobi Review, Huobi Global is a cryptocurrency exchange offering professional trading tools, but it’s not available in the U.S. or Japan. This exchange offers over 350 cryptocurrencies for buying, selling, and trading, as well as access to margin and futures trading, trading bots, over-the-counter (OTC) trading, and staking crypto assets to earn rewards. It also offers loans to borrow against your crypto holdings. As one of the largest global exchanges with reasonable trading fees, Huobi Global is a great option for moderate and advanced traders, as well as institutional investors.

  • What is Huobi?
  • Key Features & Advantages of Huobi
  • Huobi Review
    • Pros:

What is Huobi?

Huobi Review, Huobi is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows their users to perform different trading, buying, and selling activities right on a single platform. It was first founded in 2013 in China, but it has expanded to different countries since its release. As of now, Huobi is based in Seychelles, a country in East Africa, and has its headquarters there. But the platform does have several offices based in different countries like Japan, the US, Hong Kong, and South Korea.

Huobi Review, How To Create Huobi Account 2022

There are three different versions of Huobi exchange available for users to access. There is one version for South Korea, one for Japan, and a global version for everyone else to use and perform financial activities. This review will focus on the global version of Huobi.

Create Huobi Account

  • Web Address: www.huobi.com
  • Main location: Seychelles
  • Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, SOL, DOT, DOGE, SHIB & 300+ more
  • Fiat Currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, RUB, UAH, KZT and more
  • Trading Fees: 0.2%
  • Deposit Methods: Bank transfer, Visa/Mastercard, Cryptocurrency
  • Deposit Fees: Free
  • Mobile app: Yes

Key Features & Advantages of Huobi

Huobi Review, Huobi unquestionably has some of the best advantages and features that traders and investors love, I have compiled a list of these features for you to take a look at and evaluate how they can improve your trading experience.

  • User-friendly platform – Easy and fast buy/sell
  • Available for PC, Android and iOS Users
  • Over 300+ different cryptocurrencies available
  • Fast and reliable exchanges and swaps
  • Only 0.2% trading fees for makers and takers
  • Staking available for a few cryptocurrencies
  • Rewards system integrated
  • Bot trading introduced
  • P2P buying and selling
  • Crypto loans and borrowing
  • Diverse trading options
  • Guides and information articles
  • Premium customer support

Huobi Review

Pros:

  • Over 300+ cryptocurrencies supported
  • Fiat and crypto deposits and withdrawals available
  • Live Chat support
  • Rewards, promotions and staking
  • User-friendly platform and mobile app

Cons:

  • Uncertain withdrawal fee
  • No fiat market for trading
  • Not available in the USA – they can use HBUS instead

How To Create Huobi Account

To register a new Huobi account follow this step-by-step guide:

1. Click the “Sign Up” button in the top right-hand side of the website as below or click the link https://www.huobi.com/

Create Huobi Account

2. Register for a Huobi account using your mobile phone or email address

3.Fill in the fields as below

  • Please choose Nationality correctly as it cannot be revised after registration
  • Input your Phone number or Email address
  • Password must be 8-20 characters with at least 1 letter. It cannot be only numbers

Example of a valid password: h8b21xs5ea

  • Optional – Key in any referral/invitation code that may have been given to you by your referrer
  • Agree to the Huobi User Agreement Privacy Policy and click “Sign Up”.

Verdict

Huobi is a premium exchange for those who are looking forward to trading, buying, or selling cryptocurrencies due to the availability of more than 300+ cryptocurrencies. The overall experience of using the exchange on desktop and mobile app is seamless and simple. The trading fee is fixed at 0.2% which is very reasonable for a large crypto exchange, and users can access plenty of promotions and rewards based on meeting certain conditions.

If you are looking for a platform where you can get all-in-one features, Huobi is worth a try. Only derivatives trading is restricted in some countries, but rest assured, you won’t face such problems with other markets and features. In the USA, Huobi is not available, but you can access HBUS which is specially built for US residents.
